Name: Fantasy Fairways
About the game: What if you had to get a hole-in-one on every hole? Fantasy Fairways is a golf game where you design your own path to the hole. Bounce the ball off trampolines, zoom through different power ups, even take it through wormholes -- several gizmos let you express yourself. The game is all about balancing your own creativity and skill. Design the hole of your dreams and carefully aim the perfect ace. Course Mode: Play through nine holes of the game at once and try to get the best score possible. Puzzle Mode: Play and unlock individual levels at your leisure. Random Mode: Play through a random nine holes from any of the courses in the game. Timed Mode: Beat a course in as little time as possible. Multiple Courses: There are three courses (9 holes each) in the game. Dream Links, Lucid Lake, and Crystal Peaks. Fancy Balls: Every level and course has several ways to unlock new customization options for your ball. Cheat Codes: Hidden secrets are everywhere that unlock more fancy balls for you to use.
